response.original_title: Weaving Hazel's Journey: A South of Midnight Documentary
response.overview: Weaving Hazel’s Journey explores the development and world-building behind South of Midnight. In addition to a first look at new gameplay, this documentary features exclusive commentary from the team and talent who shaped South of Midnight’s captivating music, art, gameplay, and narrative.
response.title: Weaving Hazel's Journey: A South of Midnight Documentary
